comment: So after years and nearly K followers, Twitter suspended my account. I am still bugging them to give specifics as to why and appealing, but not getting anywhere. Need to find my friends here! Anyone?
amr:
# ::snt So after years and nearly K followers, Twitter suspended my account. I am still bugging them to give specifics as to why and appealing, but not getting anywhere. Need to find my friends here! Anyone?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / suspend-01

                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Twitter"))
            :ARG1 (a / account
                  :poss (ii / i))
            :time (a2 / after
                  :op1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (m2 / multiple
                              :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (y / year)))
                        :op2 (n2 / nearly
                              :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit y)))))
      :snt2 (b / bugger-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (t3 / they)
            :ARG2 (d / detail-01
                  :ARG0 t3
                  :ARG1 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (t4 / thing
                              :ARG0-of (c / cause-01))
                        :op2 (a5 / appeal-01)))
            :mod (s2 / still)
            :concession (g / get-05
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 ii2
                  :ARG2 (a6 / anywhere)))
      :snt3 (n3 / need-01
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 (f / find-01
                  :ARG0 ii3
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91
                              :ARG1 ii3
                              :ARG2 (f2 / friend)))
                  :location (h2 / here))
            :polarity (a7 / amr-unknown)))
